titleInfo.title: Identification of Xe interface states in the Xe(111)/Pt(111) system by spin-resolved photoelectron spectroscopy

mods.abstract: New electronic states at the Xe(111)/Pt(111) interface are identified to be Xe-3p-derived states by spin resolved photoelectron spectroscopy using circularly polarized radiation from the BESSY 6.5m NIM beamline. Their initial energies lie above the valence band maximum of bulk Xe. The final state energy and spin polarization is determined by bulk Xe conduction band states.
